Elene Ruldegost was a young noblewoman, member of the Ruldegost family of Waterdeep in the midâ€“14 century DR.
In early 1370 DR, Elene Ruldegost and Asborn Moonstar fell madly in love to the disapproval of their families. The Moonstars and Ruldegost were old enemies and forbade the union. Eventually, Ruldegost agreed to let the young couple to be wed under one condition, Asborn was to delve into Undermountain and retrieve a rare crystal rose from the Garden of the Drow. The young man descended into the dungeon right away and disappeared for over a week. When the families started getting worried over his well-being, they requested Khelben Arunsuns aid. He sent his loyal agent to retrieve the boy. Khelbenite subsequently found the boys lifeless body, sealed in the gardens chamber where he perished of hunger. The adventurer retrieved the crystal rose and delivered it to Elene Ruldegost along with the dire news.
